actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Resources.

actions.subcommittee: National Parks, Recreation and Public Lands
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks, Recreation and Public Lands.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on National Parks, Recreation, and Public Lands

official_title: To provide for the implementation of the agreement between the Secretary of the Interior and the Governor of Arizona to facilitate a land exchange of Federal and State lands between the United States and the State of Arizona pending a State referendum regarding the agreement in 2002.

summary.text: Provides for the implementation of a specified land exchange agreement between Arizona and the United States, but not the actual land conveyance which shall depend upon a specified Arizona referendum.

titles.title: To provide for the implementation of the agreement between the Secretary of the Interior and the Governor of Arizona to facilitate a land exchange of Federal and State lands between the United States and the State of Arizona pending a State referendum regarding the agreement in 2002.
